    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRequest

        public HttpRequest(java.lang.String requestLine,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> requestHeader,
                   java.lang.String requestBody)
            throws HttpBadRequestException
        The constructor of an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        requestLine - the request line that correspond to the first line of the HTTP request
        requestHeader - the header section of the HTTP request
        requestBody - the body section of the HTTP request
        Throws:
        HttpBadRequestException - if there's something wrong with general header or header section
